changeSet.sql: IF IndexProperty(Object_Id('FFF_STAGING.TIMESERIES_HEADER'), 'IX_TIMESERIES_HEADER_FORECAST', 'INDEXID') IS NULL CREATE INDEX IX_TIMESERIES_HEADER_FORECAST ON FFF_STAGING.TIMESERIES_HEADER (FORECAST) INCLUDE ([TASK_COMPLETION_TIME],[WORKFLOW_ID])

rollback.sql: IF IndexProperty(Object_Id('FFF_STAGING.TIMESERIES_HEADER'), 'IX_TIMESERIES_HEADER_FORECAST', 'INDEXID') IS NOT NULL DROP INDEX IX_TIMESERIES_HEADER_FORECAST ON FFF_STAGING.TIMESERIES_HEADER
